landing.bio: A highly organized and self-motivated programmer who is passionate about solving problems. Known as a self-starter, team player and good at multitasking who is strive to consistently exceed expectations. I have strong knowledge of object-oriented programming and application development tools using different programming languages.

experience.aboutWork: Selected to develop a client-based online wholesale web application. Key responsibilities and accomplishments:|❖ Handled database and Web site programming tasks (primarily using Php, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap,) working an average of 20 hours per week while maintaining regular classes.|❖ Resolved as many problems as I could as a beginner and used Laravel web application framework to develop the online wholesale mobile phone shop.
Developed a web interface for the company itself using Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript
Key responsibility was to design creative flyers, posters, banners and promote them on digital social media platforms based on different marketing strategies.

projects.title: Progressive Web Application
projects.aboutWork: Developed using Spring Boot Framework and Vaadin Framework. |• RESTful API with proper documentation using Swagger. |• Followed the Test-Driven Development (TDD) approach with Unit and Integration Tests. |• Built with microservices architecture, independent back-end and front-end apps running on different server on Heroku. |• Continuous Integration followed by Version Controlling via Github.

projects.title: Android TODO Application
projects.aboutWork: • SQLite Room Persistence Library was used to create an offline database cache. |• Developed UI/UX and used proper Room architecture pattern. |• Threading and AsyncTask used to get smooth transition between different fragments.

projects.title: Django Blog App
projects.aboutWork:
•
Simple blog app using Django Framework, Bootstrap, Javascript, HTML5,
CSS3.
•
Implemented user registration attached with a SQL database to store user
information.
•
Responsive design to achieve the goal of smooth access from any device.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering

education.university: Gulshan Model High School and College

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a computer programmer, I enjoy most of my time being at outdoors and play football. During the winter season, I love cycling around a lot. I enjoy hiking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi, thriller and crime genre movies and television shows, I am a true technology geek, and I spend a most of my time exploring the latest technology advancements in the current tech world.
